AccessToken.label: Access Token
AccessToken.description: Access token to be used as oauth_token to sign requests to your twitter account.

AccessTokenSecret.label: Access Token Secret
AccessTokenSecret.description: Access token secret to be used as oauth_token_secret to sign requests to your twitter account.

ConsumerKey.label: Consumer Key
ConsumerKey.description: Consumer key is also known as API Key. Providing this key grants access to make requests on behalf of an application.Learn more here : https://dev.twitter.com/oauth/application-only

ConsumerSecret.label: Consumer Secret
ConsumerSecret.description: Consumer secret and key together provide access to make requests on behalf of this application. Learn more here : https://dev.twitter.com/oauth/application-only
